title: Bug 18163: Add Import doesn't ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When attempting to use Ctrl+M (Add Import), the action fails due to trailing whitespace in the selected text.
OB: Upon using Ctrl+M (Add Import), no action occurs when there is trailing whitespace within the selected text.
EB: Ctrl+M (Add Import) should successfully add imports even if there is leading or trailing whitespace within the selection.
SR:
1. Select text containing leading or trailing whitespace.
2. Use Ctrl+M (Add Import).
3. Observe that the import should be added without being affected by the whitespace.
